name: Slime Experiments
description:
A researcher who has taken an interest in slimes has captured you and you are forced to go through various experiments in order to maybe earn your freedom once again. The researcher will test your intelligence though various puzzle experiments that get harder and incorporate more elements as they go on. Will you be able to solve them all?

You will be thrown into a simple puzzle game that involves moving blocks, levers, pressure plates, and other mechanics as you attempt to reach the exit of each level. Each level has a timer that keeps track of the time it takes for you to solve it and the game will save the 10 highest times for each level, so you can try to beat your quickest times.
